name: Excelsior Hilton Palermo

reviews.text: Nice hotel. Relatively well maintained compared to everything I saw in Palermo. Location is ok, less than 10 minutes on a bus from all of the major attractions. Could be cleaner(especially halls and stairs) and quieter(new windows will not change the design of the building?). Otherwise very helpful stuff and nice rooms. Definitely good value for money if you are able to book it at around 100-130 Eur per room.
reviews.title: Nice place, beware of the noisy rooms though

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Upon our arrival at the Hilton hotel in Palermo, we were notified that we have been upgraded to a Junior Suite. And wow - the room was extremely spacious and featured a separate living room. Most importantly the King-size bed in the room was extremely comfortable and with cotton linen, made the stay comfortable. We requested a room with a garden view. Even though one can't expect Central Park, the greenery outside the window is a nice escape from some of Palermo's gritty concrete buildings. Breakfast were adequate, not the best we've had on the trip, and featured the faithful bread & pastries, cheese, fruit and a sad selection of warm food (mushrooms, tomatoes and bacon).
reviews.title: What a lovely surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A good location away from the noisy centre but we had to change rooms to a quiet one in the roof area because our original allocated room faced the busy street. The staff were helful. The breakfasts were good but the food in the bar was dreadful. We arrived late and ordered a snack at 9pm. It was quite awful. The room we had in the roof area was fine and the bed was comfortable.
reviews.title: A good place to stay

reviews.text: We found the hotel pretty and well-located. The desk staff were sometimes a bit rushed, but generally helpful. Housekeeping was immaculate and the room well-supplied. The breakfast offered more than enough quality choices and the waitstaff was friendly and efficient.
reviews.title: Convenient, Clean and Charming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very convenient situation for all Palermo offers and near the English gardens. Friendly receptionists and clean and quite spacious room. Breakfasts were plentiful and varied and staff courteous. Ate and drank in bar and staff equally good and lunch/food of very good quality. A pity the bar area was so small though as this is a large and inviting hotel and bar area seemed a bit cramped.
reviews.title: Lovely comfortable hotel ; well situated.
Turn and don't look back!!
reviews.text: Paid 9 rooms for € 150 each per night. What we got: No toilet paper. Had to tell them that they forgot to place paper in the bath room. Pillows and sheets stinking fish. Wondering how on earth they managed that. The fridge was not working of the minibar. So we had a weekend of this 4 star hotel with lukewarm drinks, stinking bed sheets and no toilet paper. In addition to that a taxi company with collaboration with the hotel management, that the hotel booked had an agreement of payment of € 65 transfer between hotel and Airport. We was fooled to pay € 270 or we will miss the flight. To rearrange with another taxi company would take an hour for taxi to arrive. That was what the driver did. He took the money before we sat in the taxi and literally thew us out 5 minutes from the hotel. Luckily there was a restaurant nearby we could ask them to call after a taxi. It is so intimidating being in a country a very few can speak English and no legal rights to claim. We had just to take our flight and there was no time or way for reporting to police.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a lovely stay at the Hilton Palermo Excelsior and thought that this hotel is very underrated. We stayed here for 2 nights after getting a summer special rate online (Stay 2 nights for the price of one), which worked out at about €75 a night with breakfast. We thought this was an amazing deal and after staying in the hotel we would have happily paid full price. The room we were given (King Guest Room plus) was very spacious, tastefully decorated, quiet, and we didn't see any of the renovations talked about by other visitors. The bed was a huge king and very lovely to sleep in. The bathroom was also very large and there were some very nice tolietries (Crabtree & Evelyn). We loved the whole feel off the hotel which was more like an Italian villa. The breakfast every morning was in a very elegant room with Murano Glass chandeliers and their were plenty of choices to eat.
reviews.title: A great Italian Hilton stay
Okay hotel
reviews.text: We drove to the hotel and we could have used the valet carparking for €20 per day however there were plenty of parking places available on the street (lots of light, so it seemed safe) which were by pay meter (between 8am-8pm for €1 an hour). The hotel location was perfectly fine - it was about a 10-15min walk to the downtown area along a main shopping boulevard which felt perfectly safe at all hours. I would happily stay here again and wished we had stayed longer!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in a newly renovated room, but right before the hotel officially became a Hilton property. It was fine, bit not fantastic, and I wouldn't choose it again if I were in Palermo. The rooms are on the small side, and if you are in a room facing the busy street, you will certainly hear a lot of traffic sounds--buses, horn honking, etc. If possible, get a room on the back side (they were all taken when we visited).
reviews.title: Great deal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel from 7/7 to 7/14 and the only negative point we could say is that we couldnt stay longer
reviews.title: Decent place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the hotel was beautiful,very very claen staff were very friendly and helpful all except 1 who was in the bar/restaurant on our last night.he was very rude and abrubt.
reviews.title: beautiful hotel,helpful/friendly staff but noisy location(shame)
Charming hotel - old style palace
reviews.text: our room was perfect with lovely comfortable bed and beautiful bathroom.slippers were a bonus.lovely.

the only downful was the hotel is smack bang in the city and its very noisy with balcony doors open,you are constantly hearing cars and scooters bibbing whicvh gets abit much if your in your room trying to relax.lol
reviews.title: Great rooms and great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: if the hotel was picked up and put somewhere quieter it would be the perfect hotel stay,and would of got full marks.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in a nice area!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the teattro massimo is a must see 15min walk away.beautiful architecture,stunning.
reviews.title: Cool – and not good for Hilton’s reputation.

reviews.text: I like Hiltons worldwide, this one is not the exclusion. Nice interior, clean comfortable rooms, restaurants, pretty simple but tasty breakfast, nice personnel. Well, I liked it! N
reviews.title: Nica place to stay and enjoy vacation

reviews.text: ot for those pretending to being elite - it is 4-stars; but appropriate quality anyway.
reviews.title: Cool Paradise in the Middle of Summer

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel met every expectation that I needed. It had airconditioning, solitutde and quiet and good food when I needed it. The fact that I arrived earlier than the alloted check-in and could be allowed in earlier, speaks to the attention of the staff. The staff made the hotel exceptional and every request (no matter how big or small) was attended to. I am glad that I stated at the Hilton because it offered close proximity to everything that I needed to see. I even asked before I arrived, by email, to have a car service from the airport and it was quickly arranged. I would remind tourists that are not familiar with Sicily that it is a slower country and things do not move as fast. My beds were wonderful and clean and so was the room. Do make the attempt to learn some Italian before you go because "mille grazie" will go a long way.
reviews.title: noise, noise, noise, never again....

reviews.text: The room that I had was on the third floor and was quieter because I did not have a balcony. I instead had a sky light which cut down on heat and noise. When in doubt ask for those rooms. The breakfast was a very good deal as well. If you can ask them to make your eggs to order. The only thing that I would not recommend are those *scrambled eggs* but the other food is quite good and plenty.
reviews.title: Pleasant experience

reviews.text: The staff, though small in number, was attentive to every question and need. I think that the hotel was exceptional because of that want to please the customer. You can't wrong if you stay at this Hilton.
reviews.title: Awful place, awful people ,never again

description: The Excelsior Palace Hotel is located in the Liberty style area of the city and is surrounded by the English Garden, Villa Garibaldi, Villa Trabia, close to the shopping area.
